channel.title: ::xteleto out of jail? 317 delta
channel.description: how do i make it so you can't ::xteleto out of jail and that mods can't do ban kick mute on higher staff? thank you

item.title: ::xteleto out of jail? 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

I got this error in my compiler. [code]client.java:12832: error: not a statement
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleto”) && !inJail) (playerRights >= 1)) ;
^
client.java:12832: error: ‘;’ expected
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleto”) && !inJail) (playerRights >= 1)) ;
^
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ::xteleto out of jail? 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“john1716, post:6, topic:450404”][quote author=mista pnut link=topic=553287.msg4053778#msg4053778 date=1342751314]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("xteleto") && !inJail){

You may wish to add “&& playerRights >= 1”
[/quote]
Thank you! How do I make it so lower rank can’t do commands on higher staff?[/quote]

Add a condition to it similar to how you just did to that one. You’re welcome by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: ::xteleto out of jail? 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“john1716, post:3, topic:450404”]can you fix this for me so i have an example for the others? I’m new to coding. [code]if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if(!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()){
toX = p.absX;
toY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sM("Teleto: to "+p.playerName);
}
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sM(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code][/quote]

if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (notinjailorsomeshit))

item.title: ::xteleto out of jail? 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

can you fix this for me so i have an example for the others? I’m new to coding. [code]if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if(!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()){
toX = p.absX;
toY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sM("Teleto: to "+p.playerName);
}
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sM(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code]
